channel.title: Need a guide on how to make a rs private server?
channel.description: Can some one make me a runescape private server guide. But can you make sure its one that you dont have to port forward. Also please give me some sources to pick out plz. If you can add the jdk download link.

item.title: Need a guide on how to make a rs private server?
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

If you want people to be able to get on your server you have to portfoward.

and theres a guide from stormcutter, in downloads section. Without portfowarding you will only be able to localhost.
